We take pride in delivering work of the highest standard, continually innovating to shape the railroad of the future. As responsible railroaders, we make the right decisions every time, putting safety first, acting with unwavering integrity, and holding ourselves accountable for our actions. We believe in succeeding together-by fostering inclusivity and collaboration, we sustainably deliver exceptional results for our customers. We welcome students aboard to join our team and play a valuable role in the engine that keeps the North American economy on track. Expect an exciting environment where you'll be encouraged to learn, grow, and be recognized for your unique ideas and contributions. Work on pivotal projects with experienced collaborators who will encourage you to share your perspectives, and thrive in our close-knit, safety-focused culture. The careers we offer are meaningful because the work we do matters. Join us and get your career moving! Intern, Data Governance & Quality This is a full-time summer internship lasting from May 11, 2026, until August 28, 2026. Job Summary The Intern, Data Governance & Quality is responsible in ensuring the accuracy, accessibility, and usability of our organization's data. The role provides an opportunity to gain hands-on experience in data collection, organization, and analysis, while working closely with a dynamic team of professionals. The position requires meticulous attention to detail and enthusiasm for data-driven insights which are key assets in contributing to the data management efforts. The incumbent works within the Data Services group across multiple areas such as Data Governance, Platforms, Development, Analytics and Science. Major Responsibilities • Analyze data with data profiling and visualization tools in order to identify issues and recommend improvement actions • Design and build data pipelines and data quality rules to move and validate the data, as well as dashboards and metrics to monitor it • Collaborate with business and technology partners to define, develop, and document detailed business, data, and governance requirements • Participate as a member of the agile team focused on developing new capabilities, including daily scrums and sprint planning • Collaborate with Project Managers, Data Developers, Product Owners, data Subject Matter Experts (SMEs), Integration Managers and other stakeholders to deliver an end-to-end capability from concept to production deployment Job Requirements Requirements • Strong communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to deliver message and ideas effectively to diverse audiences such as business, development, quality engineers and management stakeholders • An interest for constantly exploring emerging technology such as Databricks, Tableau, Informatica, Cloud Platforms • • Familiarity with Jira or Azure DevOps and Confluence Proficient with Excel, Visio, Structure Query Language (SQL), some reporting and analytical tools • Understands Data Modelling concepts • Able to handle multiple priorities and work independently, as well as part of a team • Experience with technology project delivery and agile delivery methodology* • Prior experience with creating visualization such as Process and Data Flows • Ability to produce data mapping between Source and Target Systems Ability to capture user stories and use cases • Education • Currently enrolled in a relevant technology program such as Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology Management, Mathematics or Data Analytics *Any experience/education/skills/knowledge for these above would be considered as an asset N/A Citizenship Requirement APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://cn360.csod.com/ux/ats/careersite/6/home/requisition/16300?c=cn360&sq=req16300&lang=en-US Application Deadline: January 31 st , 2026 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
